front.title: IANA Considerations for Internet Group Management Protocols

author.organization: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Lab

abstract.t: This document specifies revised IANA Considerations for the Internet Group Management Protocol and the Multicast Listener Discovery protocol. This document specifies the guidance provided to IANA to manage values associated with various fields within the protocol headers of the group management protocols. This document obsoletes RFC 3228 and updates RFC 4443.
